sentences.english: Lehman Brothers was a symptom of a dysfunctional financial system and regulatory failure.
sentences.chinese: 雷曼兄弟是异化的金融系统和监管失败的症状。

sentences.english: I probably would have let Lehman go, too.
The bankruptcy of Lehman might have been avoided but what would have happened to the asset super-bubble?
sentences.chinese: 雷曼或许会免于破产，但资产超级泡沫会怎样？

sentences.english: It expresses the anger that many former Lehman employees still feel toward Mr Fuld.
sentences.chinese: 书中表达了许多原雷曼兄弟员工对福尔德先生的愤慨。

sentences.english: The speed and ferocity of the Lehman Brothers crisis brought the world to the brink of a meltdown.
sentences.chinese: 雷曼兄弟危机的快速和凶猛将世界带到了崩溃的边缘。

sentences.english: In the aftermath of the Lehman crisis, policymakers broadly did the right thing.
sentences.chinese: 决策层在雷曼破产后的措施大抵正确。

sentences.english: The Lehmans episode demonstrates that incompetence has a price.
sentences.chinese: 雷曼这个小插曲说明了无能有价。

sentences.english: The American authorities decided to let Lehman fail pour encourager les autres.
sentences.chinese: 美国当局决定杀一儆百让雷曼兄弟倒台。

sentences.english: In the UK, accountants PWC will take over Lehman Bro .
sentences.chinese: 在英国，普华永道将接管雷曼兄弟事务。

sentences.english: Lehman began pitching a deal to private-equity firms two months ago.
sentences.chinese: 两个月前雷曼同一家私募公司展开了一桩交易。

sentences.english: Imagine the headquarters of Lehman Brothers converted into a commune.
sentences.chinese: 可以想想雷曼兄弟公司的头脑们住进公社是什么样子。

sentences.english: Fuld has been at Lehman for 40 years.
Lehman last week acknowledged that rumors were pressuring its stock.
sentences.chinese: 雷曼兄弟上周承受，谣言正令其股价承压。

sentences.english: Lehman was once the 4th-largest investment bank in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 雷曼兄弟曾是美国第4大投资银行。

sentences.english: This left Lehman with no option but to prepare for bankruptcy.
sentences.chinese: 这迫使雷曼除了破产外没有其它选择。

definition: Paulson or Powellson (name)/Henry (Hank) Paulson (1946-), US banker, US Treasury Secretary from 2006
becquerel (unit of radioactivity, symbol Bq)/abbr. for 貝克勒爾|贝克勒尔[bei4 ke4 le4 er3]
Hofmann or Hoffman (name)/August Wilhelm von Hofmann (1818-1892), German chemist/Dustin Hoffman (1937-), US film actor
